column1: fantastic monitor best in gaming class
this is really the best monitor ive been able to use so far it is suitable for office applications as i use it for working from home and studying perfect for gaming as well as privately
it has very good colors and is perfect for gaming and watching videos its the best monitor

very nice screen what a pleasure to play in 1440p and 120hz delivery was expected within 1 month i received it after 2 weeks no dead pixels no light leaks i am extremely satisfied with my purchase that i recommend of course

this monitor is amazing as it has an ips panel this means that colours will be very accurate it is gsync compatible and works by eliminating tearing in games the 165hz is also a nice boost over 144hz overall i am very happy with this monitor and would recommend it to anyone
very pleased with this dell monitor crisp image quality and easy to set upfast delivery and with hdmi cables included thanks
unbelievably good for just under £300 i cant recommend this product enough
absolutely cool colors top no backlight bleeding mega satisfied clear purchase recommendation d
everything is awsome with this one 2k is amazing step from full hd 165 hz is more than enough

the quality is a major upgrade to what i had before video games look amazing in 2k and play smoothly the colors also are amazing for movie nights and large resolution is decent enough to do creative work and work with many tabs at once
literally after switching from a tn panel 1080p monitor this monitor seemed out of this world the quality of colours and the display quality is just fantastic great monitor

super clear and great picture perfect for gaming working and image editing i have had some wqhd monitors by now and i have to say its the best priceperformance for about 350€ a real bargainadjustability optics subtle gamer no plastic bomber ips 165 hz 1 ms 2560 x 1440 easy to use

an excellent screen that perfectly meets my needs i use this screen for both work and play and this screen is perfect i love its sleek design its thin edges the joystick to navigate the menu no problem with scrolling no visual artifact qhd resolution at the top at stake the fluidity of 144hz is a treat fully satisfied with this screen
a really great screen that could only use a little more brightness but otherwise fully meets my wishes absolute buy recommendation at the price
bought for my husband who loves it said it made a huge difference
very nice monitor at a very nice price
i like dell monitors and if id go 1440p165 hz then this would be the go to choice for both ergonomics colour and gaming perfect all rounder usb ports are also really nice to have

£250 quite a nice bargain for a 1440p 165hz ips panel monitor aesthetically looks great too nice but not obtrusive blue led on the back screen size is perfect for desktop use if you are umming and erring over whether to go 32inch or 27inch i definitely recommend 27inch especially for 1440pabsolutely worth the £250 spent very happy
im completely satisfied with the monitor everything works great and didnt have dead pixels

i went from a 1080p va panel to this and wow the different was unreal the picture quality is amazing playing xbox series x at 2k 120fps backlight bleed is barely noticeable on my panel would deff recommend

extraordinary ips monitor great text quality rare in this technology very little bleeding may vary depending on the unit excellent color quality slightly oversaturated i prefer it elegant and beautifully finished highly recommended
quality article 5 stars i recommend it without a doubt
everything was great
this dell is great for gaming and for typical using also 1010 from amateur like me
im very satisfied crisp colors black is black no bright spots on the edges and the 165 hz is mega for gaming perfectly harmonizes with my rtx 3080 with gsync

this is a fantastic monitor for both gaming or office work with 27inch 1440p ips 165 hz this will comfortably handle anything you throw at it dell have perfected the monitor stand unlike other brands if you can pick this up for the midhigh 300 euro mark you are getting a bargain in this price point stongly recommend
nice monitor am not disappointed 2k top
great price easy to assemble build quality is excellent the quality is right all around black level and contrast are excellent i have nothing to complain about

it seems to me that after a few months i can give my honest opinion about the monitor the image and build quality of the monitor is incredible you can see the dell quality behind it i dont even know how to describe it awesome for this price

i opted for the 27inch qhd 165hz model and frankly i am super satisfied with it i got it for 300€ through an amazon retailer and i am stunned i come from a 24 inch screen tn 60hz panel i can only recommend
very good monitor at a good price
i tested some and sent it back again this one is still with me im very satisfied
worth the money despite the rather high price great picture high resolution and adjustable to any position also easy to use the onscreen menu via a stick

just top thin display borders high frame ratefast response timehigh quality ips panelvery nice colorsmany ports usb hub nvidia gsync runs wonderfullyheight adjustable very brightall in one a clear purchase recommendation
having been able to get it for 175€ i am very satisfied
very good image quality and no leakage light
i cant say anything negative about this monitor im very happy

the dell s2721dgf is a 27 1440p 165hz gaming monitor with ips panel excellent ergonomics both horizontal and vertical good image quality and constructiondesign little usage time but satisfied with the monitor

would have expected to see this product at a much higher price bracket certified for amd freesync™ premium proyour gpu software detectsautomatically enables this functionality build quality is solid picture is brilliant dont hesitate buy it now
screen looks great high refresh rate and works well with both amd or nvidia not a device to watch films on etc
play videovery good manufacturing quality sober and correct aesthetics smooth and crisp image no dead pixel responsive enough for my needs it is gsync compatible

this is almost a perfect monitor if it wasnt for the stand the baseplate of the stand is too big for meotherwise its absolute perfect for gaming supports gsync perfect colour accurecy and viewing angles are amaging
very good monitor

the monitor looks fantastic the only negative aspect is the low contrast refresh rate of 165hz is perfect but remember you need a powerful gpu in order to exploit everything from this monitor i strongly suggest this product not so expensive and good performances and quality
minimal bright spots on black green easy to use menus and no dead pixelsafter using the monitor every day since buying the overall performance for gaming and work has been very good

i have the monitor in the bought offer for 350 euros for this price range mmn gets the best overall package compared to other monitors the extra features are nice but you can also turn them all off great advantage compared to other monitors for the price amd freesync and nvidia gsync clear recommendation for people who also want to switch to 2k
very good monitor for xbox series x 120hz 1440p and vrr work fine not all overdrive settings can be used when using freesync
works and looks great on the xbox series x when playing at 120fpsand its not bank breaking considering the quality
i am very meticulous about monitors so a clear recommendation image and illumination is very good even with games no problems so far
really good screen at the same time you the price everything to please
easy to assemble super chic top quality
mainly streaming and gaming never ever had a problem with dell but this little beauties colours and detail is amazing
use this mainly for gaming been great for that only downside is hdr but thats pretty overated and only good on very pricey products this is great for its price amazing value
monitor not used for gaming purchased for greater clarity than my old 24 monitor this screen is an impressive improvement in clarity and brightness

great upgrade from my old 1080p 60hz monitor the colours are briliant and i use it for amateur photo editing and gaming the only thing that bothers me is that its a little bit darker in the corners but i noticed that large screens almost always have that
finally a monitor where the priceperformance ratio is right 10bit color depth 166hz 1ms ips display response time and the beautiful blue back light
its a good screen for pc i use it as a computer screen

i upgraded from a 1080p ips 60hz monitor and the difference is huge it comes a little over saturated out of the box but dialing down the red has solved that issue i play fps games like fortnite and counter strike and the smoothness at 165hz is amazing also great for photo editing
actually the monitor is already very good in terms of sharpness and color if not blb and ips glow were so strongas a result the dell s2721dgfa declined directly
super screen suitable for xbox x series you can get 2k and 120hz with the vrr option enabled on the console unlike
excellent product dell never disappoints the first one came with dead pixels and light leaks i requested the replacement and now its perfect
purchased this for my series x to be able to play games at 1440p at 120fps works flawlessly with lightning fast response times

i was looking for a 24 gaming monitor that visually matches my existing dell i also need two inputs so that i can also switch on my company laptop this monitor has 2x hdmi and one displayport it is bright enough lighter than many a normal dell and also looks good when gaming i can fully recommend the monitor
i love it
as expected no issues or defects in my unitwould recommend

very good monitor after testing 2 asus 280hz that have come with light leaks due to poor quality control i am very happy with the quality of this monitorit is not as fast as the asus vg259qm 280hz for gaming but it does have more quality overall

the picture is great although i had a 25inch wqhd monitor from dell before gsync only works via dp no pixel errors illumination okay im not a hardcore gamer mainly home office and occasional shooter on black friday 309 euros but unbeatable unfortunately only one dp but hdmi for notebook is also possible
very nice screen it should be noted that it has a lot of backlight bleeding but for 175 euros its hard to complain
love it
i recommend this screen there are very few ips glow there will always be on ips screens i took 3 use for gaming but also for office automation

quality beauty and technical features are all perfect for under 400 euros the only downside is that it doesnt have a speaker thats why i gave it 4 stars and not 5 the base is about big but beautiful so it doesnt bother
great seller the first monitor weve ordered was faulty and when contacted the seller they offered a replacement straight away would definitely recommend
looks good works good stand is fully adjustablenot bright enough for true hdr tho back lights arent rgb and no speakers

ive had the screen for a few months now and use it for streaming gaming and home office i havent noticed any flaws so far 2 windows can be easily placed next to each other and is therefore ideal in the home office for me i easily mounted the screen on a flexible lifting arm gas pressure

good monitor perfect for the advertised use case no pixel errors or similar backlight bleeding is also limited for the builtin ips panel from lg colors accurate freesync works hdr is nice 2 have but i wouldnt put much emphasis on that

awesome screen quick and easy assembly quality workmanship and an acceptable pricei just couldnt get the color setting right presumably personal failure fortunately there is good free software msi true color for something like that
i think its a great screen and of very good quality but i think there is no option
great

screen satin finish resists reflectionsrefresh times excellentbright screenexcellent sharpness for gamingwide range of inputsonly criticismlack of speakers even though most people arent a fan of internal speakers it just gives you options

using it for xbox series x and excelwork after spending about 6 months researching the best compromise can not recommend this enoughextremely happy with it i dont think youll find a better monitor at this price point
